pr_title: HDDS-4277.  Support Bucket Namespace Quota Updates

timeline.author: linyiqun
linyiqun

timeline.bodyText: We should move checkBucketQuotaInNamespace check after checkBucketQuotaInBytes. Here we add cache entry before quota check, this will lead the dirty data.
timeline.author: linyiqun
linyiqun
linyiqun

timeline.bodyText:
If the key is created successfully, but write failed before the commit key (for example, client crashes), then the key should not be counted.
We'd better  incrUsedNamespace(-1L), when we clean up this key in the background.
timeline.author: captainzmc

replies.bodyText:
I see.
Do you know where is the place that does such failed key cleanup?
replies.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: @captainzmc  do you have an idea how does the background cleanup happen on keys that failed to commit?
replies.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText:
There is a PR #1511 currently cleaning open key. I think we can use this. Update quota during cleanup.
But this PR is not merged yet, and we do not need to block here. We can fix this after #1511 is merged.
replies.author: captainzmc

replies.bodyText: Got it. Have filed a jira to track it: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-4620
replies.author: amaliujia
